website_summaries.verdict: Customize this cabinet with easy interlocking and detachable compartments. Sleek and stylish transparent black design, with plenty of storage space.
pros: This practical and functional cabinet includes 2 large drawers, 6 small drawers, and 16 top compartments
Easy to customize to your needs with interlocking compartments, or use them separately
cons: Drawers aren't deep enough for some

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color received
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave it 4 stars is because I ordered the black and received the clear. I don’t want to have to ship it back and wait on a new one so I’ll just use the clear. It’s also smaller than I expected but it holds almost all I need it to and doesn’t take up too much space. Good quality product as well. Doesn’t seem like cheap thin plastic that will break easily.
customer_reviews.author: brooke wille-neal

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the first squeak of the morning.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup holder does what it says. It holds your makeup. Well, maybe more trial sized... Before I owned this I was using a makeup bag so it's definitely an upgrade. I wish it held more palettes because I'm not sure what to do with that thin drawer. I know you can buy additional pieces to add on, but my vanity already looks clunky with it. It's simple and good for beginners but you can tell how cheap it is. It makes the most horrible plastic screeching sound on some of the drawers. If you want something to do the job for real cheap, this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the complete set, and was so glad I did. I'm not an avid makeup collector, but I have enough crap that trying to keep it all together in an orderly fashion was doable, but not satisfying for the perfectionist in me. This thing holds all of my makeup + brushes + moisturizer + sponges and remover, and there's still a little room for more. I just put rocks and sea shells in the top areas that were left open. It's so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Turnbow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that's it's black! Matches my bathroom perfectly. Great storage.
customer_reviews.author: Courtneybags

customer_reviews.title: Color, size, functionality are as expected. A great solution to my bathroom war situation...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the size I expected, drawers move easily and are lined with a light velvet insert. This classes it up a little and keeps earrings and beads from rolling around noisily. The modular nature of the unit means I can add another section later on, if I like. I do appreciate that aspect. The color is exactly as the picture. This fits in perfectly on my bathroom counter! The hubby is also happy because all of my crap is no longer scattered all over the countertop. :P
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I just got this the other day and I'm already obsessed. Such a great organizer for all of my makeup, which was previously piled into a box that I had to dig through every morning. The quality seems really good so far especially considering how heavy it is, which makes it less likely to tip over when you open the drawers. There's a nice variety of drawer sizes and compartments to fit all of your different makeup types. I was hesitant about the black color but I'm so glad I got it instead of a totally clear set so you don't see all the nitty gritty from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love! Works Great! I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and holds so much make-up and other beauty products. I like the smokey color which It goes well in my bathroom. It makes it so much easier for me to get ready & much quicker as I have the most used items at my fingertips. I like that I can organize the drawers by, mascara, gloss, shadow Etc... it's so much easier than digging through a drawer when I rushing. I would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shnookie04

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe how beautiful this makeup organizer is
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how beautiful this makeup organizer is. It has so many compartments and can practically store all of my makeup... and then some! I highly recommend this for the lovely ladies that like keeping their makeup tidy and want to say goodbye to clutter! Great product, the packaging was very nice, and kept it very well protected. 5 stars all the way! I’m simply obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. I like that I can stack them or lay them out. I wish the drawers had dividers between these so they would open and close easier when full, but over all happy with the purchase. I have all my make up in one and hair supplies in another. Helps to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer! I have a designated drawer for different products and I like how it is stackable.I only wish that the very top part that is designated for brushes had a little bit deeper wells to hold brushes more upright. The insides of the drawers come with a black soft mesh type material, which is very nice. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: vivian r.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage but the drawers were a little more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Good storage but the drawers were a little more than expected. Mine also arrived without one of the smaller drawers. I didn't want to go through the hassle of the return, so I just deal with the missing drawer. Overall it's a good buy for someone looking to organize a lot of small things and a few lipsticks/brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It fits all my makeup perfectly, a side from my larger pallets. Easy to assemble and with it being stackable it is just the right size for my bathroom. I do wish it had more lipstick compartments though.
customer_reviews.author: Najwa DeForest

customer_reviews.title: Great for your vanity!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer.. It looks great on my vanity. I love the color since I did not want a clear one, matches my black vanity. You can fit naked pallettes or Kat Von D pallettes on the large drawers. I did not give it a five start because I wish it locked into place instead of being stackable. Three removeable pieces.. You cab stack all three together or have them separate.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made product. Plenty of room tho I need a second one since I have so much make up. I’ve tried so many things to organize my makeup without satisfaction. I’ve finally found what I’ve been looking for! I’ll be ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Not like the pictuee but it works
customer_reviews.text: I got mine in the mail and in works well/serves its purpose. BUT. I did buy this because it's black. Instead, I received it clear with a black velvet mat on the bottom of each drawer. It's still crystal clear and does not look even remotely tinted like the picture. If I had known that, I would've bought a cheaper clear one and saved my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is just what I needed. After getting tired of shoving all my makeup in a bag and never being able to find anything, I bought this organizer and I am so glad I did. There is so much room for everything I need and all of my things are finally neat and orderly and it looks great on my counter! So glad bought this!
customer_reviews.author: erbelady

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into makeup hardcore and this works amazing on top of my bathroom counter. It holds a lot more than you think it would. The two pieces can be separated but I leave them together. If I could find this color again I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Inkd22

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Organized Now!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It was packaged extremely well and I couldn't believe how fast it got here. The only wish would be the drawers to be a little bit deeper, but it holds everything I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice a good quality but the Drawers are very small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice a good quality but the Drawers are very small
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Middle drawers are too small for anything
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick for the most part but I'm pretty disappointed with the size of the middle drawers, much too small for any of my makeup so I'm unsure what they're even for. I may take them out and make my own because it's just wasted space now.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good makeup organizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ordering a product from this company, I liked the color that's what initially attracted me . The draws are good, and seem to be sturdy, a Couple things I didn't like are that the draws a fairly small and not deep , and if you have medium to large pallets they will not fit. Other than that the product does its job!
customer_reviews.author: TB NY

customer_reviews.title: Bad Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom section broken. Box it came in wasn't damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Small but functional
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in good shape considering there was no outer box and very little packing material. .. weird. Anyway it's small just like expected but serves its purpose. Keeps the counter clean and organized. If you have a lot of makeup you might consider two of these or find a larger one. I like it, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: This holds way more makeup than I thought. I remodeled my bathroom and wanted something sleek for my everyday makeup. This looks great on the counter and holds way more than I thought. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous makeup organizer
customer_reviews.text: I have a fair amount of makeup and was worried i needed to buy two but this organizer is perfect and holds a lot. I am so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Safirblu

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Make up, skincare, and jewelry all in one place. I love the soft draw liners so you can store jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room...Not just for cosmetics!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for cosmetics! This organizer is three stacked components made of heavy duty plastic resin. I use it for cosmetics but it could easily be used for office/desk supplies, sewing notions or arts and crafts organization.
customer_reviews.author: Dianalynn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks just like the pictures. I love this organizer. It fits most of my stuff and it looks nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Biffle

customer_reviews.text: I love this but I wish it had a few bit larger drawers to fit some of my palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer. I use it for holding my moisturizers along with my makeup. The larger drawer is perfect for my apple watch bands. It currently holds at least 16 different bands and I can fit more if needed. It's made with great material, not the cheap plastics you find in some stores. I will definitely recommend this to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect! Its compact enough to not crowd my bathroom sink while having enough holders/ drawers to hold all my make up!

customer_reviews.title: Can see the labels of lipstick and eye pencils easily up top
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised to find this holds almost all my cosmetics. Memorized where I put everything and now they are organized and neat. Can see the labels of lipstick and eye pencils easily up top.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved. Wish it had 2 deep drawers but would ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to put on my bathroom counter for my regularly used makeup and brushed. Absolutely loved. Wish it had 2 deep drawers but would still purchase again if i had to

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I love this Makeup Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Makeup Organizer. The only reason I gave it four stars is because it came with a crack on the top edge of the middle piece. I did not want to deal with the hassle of returning it and when the top piece is on it covers the crack.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for make-up lovers!

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it. The plastic is black, not brown. The tiers do not slide, and the drawers come lined. It fits the essentials, bigger palletes will not fit, but you can fit several small ones in the bottom drawer (i could fit up to 5). My only wish is that it came with more large drawers instead of the 6 small ones. But I'm pretty happy with it nonetheless.

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Makeup Organizer 8 Drawers Cosmetic Storage 3 Pieces Set Jewelry Display Case with 16 Top Compartments Black UJMU08B
feature_bullets: LARGE CAPACITY: 2 Large drawers, 6 small drawers and 16 top compartments hold at least 15 makeup brushes, 15 lipsticks, 10 nail polishes, 10 eyeliners, 5 large eye shadow palettes and other small everyday collection, well organize your make-up and dresser

BLACK MAKEUP ORGANIZER: Say goodbye to your cluttered countertop, organize cosmetics & jewelry in order; Black color matches any decor in your room; Premium material enable the cosmetic organizer durable for long time use
STACK AS YOU LIKE: 3-piece makeup organizer boxes interlock securely with anti-slip mats, you can change orders, use separately or stack more drawers up to extend capacity
SPACE SAVING: 11 5/8"H x 9 1/2"L x 5 1/2"W, the makeup storage take up little counter space, hold all of your makeup and jewelry in one place, simplify makeup routine
PRACTICAL & WASHABLE: Removable mesh liner keeps jewelry protected; Drawers operate smoothly; Won't absorb color, easy to clean with water; ideal gift for wife or daughter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars723 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: SONGMICS Makeup Organizer Cosmetic Storage Display Boxes Jewelry Chest 3 Pieces Set UJMU08B
